title: "Welcome"
---

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
df <- readr::read_csv("../data/example.csv")
ggplot(df, aes(year, value, color = group)) +
  geom_line() + geom_point() +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "Portfolio Example Plot", x = NULL, y = NULL)
```

This is a minimal Quarto site that you can extend with your own projects,
write-ups, and data visualisations.
